thread.title: VerTech Solutions Group Announces Kelly Bodnar as Director of Service Delivery
thread.title_full: VerTech Solutions Group Announces Kelly Bodnar as Director of Service Delivery

author: admin
title: VerTech Solutions Group Announces Kelly Bodnar as Director of Service Delivery
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: VerTech Solutions Group 
DENVER, CO -- (Marketwired) -- 09/29/15 -- VerTech Solutions Group, a market-leading technology solutions firm providing strategic advisory services, customer relationship management services and information technology support services, today announced that it has appointed Kelly Bodnar Director of Service Delivery. Bodnar will lead all aspects of VerTech's global service development and delivery, ensuring that customers receive the highest levels of support. 
Bodnar joins VerTech Solutions Group with a strong technical management background. She brings her ability to develop innovative solutions to solve business and technology challenges, and provides hands-on management to lead the global service delivery experience. Bodnar has key experience in managing global and strategic initiatives and has been successful in delivering outstanding results that elevate customer satisfaction and create long term business relationships. 
"We are so pleased to welcome Kelly to our growing team," said David Vande Casteele, VerTech Solutions Group president and CFO. "Our business is all about solving technology challenges for our customers and Kelly has the ability and leadership skills to ensure that they are receiving the absolute best service." 
"I'm thrilled to have this opportunity to work with the team, our partners and customers to drive the development and delivery of VerTech's services to the next level," said Bodnar. "I'm looking forward to engaging with our growing customer base and forging lasting business partnerships that deliver tremendous value both today and in the future." 
Bodnar's previous experience includes technical and management positions with Dimension Data, Time Warner Cable (Navisite), BAE Systems, and more. 
About VerTech Solutions Group VerTech Solutions Group is a strategic technology solutions firm with expertise in advisory services, customer relationship management services built on the Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform, as well as information technology support services. The company offers its clients thought leaders with proven business perspectives aimed at transforming businesses with Cloud Enablement and modernized applications that take advantage of leading edge technologies like Microsoft Azure and Office 365. These comprehensive solutions assure successful business integrations that result in demonstrable customer value and satisfaction. For more information, visit http://vertechgroup.com/ . Contact:
